data.description: The management of people and organizations: diversity, attitude and job satisfaction, emotions, personality and value, individual and group decision making, motivation, teams, leadership, influence, strategy, organizational structure and culture, and change management.
data.title: MANAGING ORGANIZATIONS

data.description: Explores the strategies and range of processes, methods, and resources that organizations use in talent (human capital) management initiatives to support achievement of business strategy and short and long-term objectives. The focus is on understanding the fundamentals of effective talent management including talent attraction, talent acquisition, talent (career) development, motivation and engagement, and talent retention.
data.title: STRATEGIC TALENT MANAGEMENT

data.description: Policies and practices; principles and techniques applicable to problems such as employee staffing, training, labor relations, wages, communications, etc.
data.title: HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT
